title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is being lost after modifying the default value.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Set a default value in the list box of a report parameter.
2. Modify the default value.
3. Check if the modified default value is retained or lost.
